name: Egyptian Sniper
description:
Control

Play with mouse and keyboard.

You have to type the patern corresponding to the targetted mommy: "AA" for the first mommies, AIM then click.

If you succeed in hard, congratulation.

Credits
  • Developer: Matthieu Saül
  • Graphics: Nicolas Saül
  • Music: Florian Dufour
  • Voices: Johanna Colin, Quentin Calabrese
External

Menu and intro music done by ericskiff.com

Zombie police made by Patrick Broderick more info in source file.

Context

Game made for ld36 http://ludumdare.com/compo/ludum-dare-36/?action=preview&uid=35115

Thanks for playing!
